sentences.en: Accusing us of being disloyal to cover his own sorry behavior is truly execrable.
sentences.cn: 他指责我们不忠诚以掩盖他自己的错误行为，真令人厌恶。

sentences.en: And after entering Mian, often also sleep and disloyal.
sentences.cn: 而入眠后, 也往往睡而不实.

sentences.en: As always, he felt disloyal at deserting his neighbor, the Reeves Building Barber Shop.
sentences.cn: 跟往常一样, 他不照顾自己的邻居--里夫斯大楼的理发馆,总觉得不够义气.

sentences.en: Between you and me, I think he's rather disloyal.
sentences.cn: 这话只跟你说,不要外传, 我看他很不忠诚.

sentences.en: Brian sided with his sister, which led his mother to accuse him of being disloyal.
sentences.cn: 布赖恩站在他姐姐这一边，他母亲就此指责他不忠。

sentences.en: He is disloyal to his cause.
He is disloyal to his family.
He was disloyal to his friends.
I am led to believe that he is disloyal to us.
sentences.cn: 某些事实使我相信他对我们不忠.

sentences.en: I thought it would be disloyal, and I hate anything of that kind.
sentences.cn: 我想,这是不顾手足之情, 而对这一类事,我都是深恶痛绝的.

sentences.en: It was because of a sense of being disloyal to the other grandchildren.
sentences.cn: 那只是因为怕有负于其他的外孙.

sentences.en: She was so disloyal to her deputy she made his position untenable.
sentences.cn: 她对她的副手很不守信义，使得他的职位岌岌可危。

sentences.en: The boss was very suspicious and thought his secretary disloyal.
sentences.cn: 老板多疑,认为他的秘书不忠诚.

sentences.en: The disloyal thought was instantly suppressed.
sentences.cn: 这个不忠的念头被立刻打住.

sentences.en: The very idea was impossible, disloyal.
sentences.cn: 连这个想法本身都是不可能的, 不忠的.

words.tran_cn: 不忠实；不义，不贞；背信弃义

trans.tran_cn: 不忠诚的，缺乏忠心的，贰
trans.tran_en: doing or saying things that do not support your friends, your country, or the group you belong to
